verse.gurmukhi: ijau imrjwdw ihMdUAW gaU mwsu AKwju[
verse.unicode: ਜਿਉ ਮਿਰਜਾਦਾ ਹਿੰਦੂਆਂ ਗਊ ਮਾਸੁ ਅਖਾਜੁ।

en.bdb: As the cow meat is forbidden in Hindu code of conduct;

transliteration.english: jiau mirajaadhaa hi(n)dhooaa(n) guoo maas akhaaju|
transliteration.hindi: जिउ मिरजादा हिंदूआँ गऊ मासु अखाजु।
transliteration.en: jiau mirajaadhaa hi(n)dhooaa(n) guoo maas akhaaju|
transliteration.hi: जिउ मिरजादा हिंदूआँ गऊ मासु अखाजु।
transliteration.ipa: d͡ʒɪo mɪrəd͡ʒɑd̪ɑ hɪŋd̪uəɑⁿ Gou mɑs əkʰɑd͡ʒʊ.
transliteration.ur: جِا مرجادا هںدُوآں گاُو ماس اکھاج۔

en.bdb: The Musalmans pledge against the pork and the interest on money;

verse.gurmukhi: shurw Gir jwvweIAY pwxI md rwju[
verse.unicode: ਸਹੁਰਾ ਘਰਿ ਜਾਵਾਈਐ ਪਾਣੀ ਮਦ ਰਾਜੁ।

en.bdb: For father-in-law, even the water of the house of son-in-law is prohibited like the wine;

transliteration.english: sahuraa ghar jaavaieeaai paanee madh raaju|
transliteration.hindi: सहुरा घरि जावाईऐ पाणी मद राजु।
transliteration.en: sahuraa ghar jaavaieeaai paanee madh raaju|
transliteration.hi: सहुरा घरि जावाईऐ पाणी मद राजु।
transliteration.ipa: səhʊrɑ Gʰər d͡ʒɑʋɑeiæ pɑɳi məd̪ rɑd͡ʒʊ.
transliteration.ur: سهُرا گھر جاواایاَے پاݨیِ مد راج۔

verse.gurmukhi: shw n KweI cUhVw mwieAw muhqwju[
verse.unicode: ਸਹਾ ਨ ਖਾਈ ਚੂਹੜਾ ਮਾਇਆ ਮੁਹਤਾਜੁ।

en.bdb: The scanvenger eats not rabbit, though he be hard of money;

transliteration.english: sahaa na khaiee choohaRaa maiaa muhataaju|
transliteration.hindi: सहा न खाई चूहड़ा माइआ मुहताजु।
transliteration.en: sahaa na khaiee choohaRaa maiaa muhataaju|
transliteration.hi: सहा न खाई चूहड़ा माइआ मुहताजु।
transliteration.ipa: səhɑ nə kʰɑei t͡ʃuhəɽɑ mɑɪɑ mʊhət̪ɑd͡ʒʊ.
transliteration.ur: سها ن کھاای چُوهڑا مااآ مُهتاج۔

verse.gurmukhi: ijau imTY mKI mrY iqsu hoie Akwju[
verse.unicode: ਜਿਉ ਮਿਠੈ ਮਖੀ ਮਰੈ ਤਿਸੁ ਹੋਇ ਅਕਾਜੁ।

en.bdb: As the dead fly makes the taste of sweet bad and the sweet getting poisonous becomes useless,

transliteration.english: jiau miThai makhee marai tis hoi akaaju|
transliteration.hindi: जिउ मिठै मखी मरै तिसु होइ अकाजु।
transliteration.en: jiau miThai makhee marai tis hoi akaaju|
transliteration.hi: जिउ मिठै मखी मरै तिसु होइ अकाजु।
transliteration.ipa: d͡ʒɪo mɪʈʰæ məkʰi məræ t̪ɪs hɔeɪ əkɑd͡ʒʊ.
transliteration.ur: جِا مٹھَے مکھیِ مرَے تس هوا اکاج۔

verse.gurmukhi: iqau Drmswl dI Jwk hY ivhu KMfUpwju ]12]
verse.unicode: ਤਿਉ ਧਰਮਸਾਲ ਦੀ ਝਾਕ ਹੈ ਵਿਹੁ ਖੰਡੂਪਾਜੁ ॥੧੨॥

en.bdb: Similarly to set one's eye upon the earning of the religious place is like eating of sugar coated poison.

transliteration.english: tiau dharamasaal dhee jhaak hai vih kha(n)ddoopaaj ||12||
transliteration.hindi: तिउ धरमसाल दी झाक है विहु खंडूपाजु ॥१२॥
transliteration.en: tiau dharamasaal dhee jhaak hai vih kha(n)ddoopaaj ||12||
transliteration.hi: तिउ धरमसाल दी झाक है विहु खंडूपाजु ॥१२॥
transliteration.ipa: t̪ɪo t̪ərəməsɑl d̪i ɖ͡ʐɑk hæ ʋɪh kʰəŋɖupɑd͡ʒ.1ə2.
transliteration.ur: تِا دھرمسال دیِ جھاک هَے وهُ کھںڈُوپاج ۔۔۱۲۔۔
